reviews.review_msg: She likes students who attend classes, comment and ask questions and read the articles. If you do the above, you will get an excellent grade. The exams are straight out of the notes and the articles. She does sometimes repeat herself and appears disorganized, but don't let it fool you - she knows what is happening. Be extra polite in her class.

easy going prof. and easy tests.  however, she doesn't have well organized notes. sometimes she gives u 2 names for the same thing and forgot to mention it. kinda confusing when studying. still a good teacher.
